tasks.name: Create MVBP_SPECIFICATION.md
tasks.description: Create detailed specification document for the Minimum Viable Betting Platform (MVBP) defining exact features for the 6-week MVP, clear inclusion/exclusion criteria, and measurable success metrics
tasks.notes: This becomes the contract for what constitutes a successful Phase B completion

relatedFiles.description: Detailed MVBP feature specification and success criteria

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Create new file: docs/MVBP_SPECIFICATION.md
2. Define MVBP scope:
   INCLUDED FEATURES:
   - Admin creates betting events through web interface
   - Users connect wallet (Phantom/Solflare) and place binary bets
   - Simple 1:1 bet matching algorithm (no partial fills)
   - Manual settlement by admin (no oracle automation)
   - Basic UI showing only essential information (team names, bet amount, outcome)
   - Escrow through individual bet PDAs for fund safety
   
   EXCLUDED FEATURES (Deferred to later phases):
   - Gary AI conversation interface
   - HeyAnon SDK integration
   - Oracle automated settlement
   - Real-time account updates
   - Complex bet matching algorithms
   - Advanced UI animations
3. Add success metrics:
   - Can create events through admin interface
   - Can place first real bet through connected wallet
   - Funds properly escrowed in bet PDAs
   - Manual settlement transfers funds correctly
4. Include user acceptance criteria for each feature
5. Add technical requirements and constraints
tasks.verificationCriteria: MVBP_SPECIFICATION.md clearly defines included/excluded features, provides measurable success metrics, includes user acceptance criteria, and serves as Phase B completion contract
tasks.analysisResult: Update all project documentation to reflect the approved phase-based restructuring from linear task approach to 4-phase development with parallel streams, MVBP definition, and 13-week timeline
